original: las dang po dang / smyos pa dang / sems 'khrugs pa dang / tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do //üîΩbslab par bya ba ni dge slong gis yul thams cad la gnas skabs thams cad du ma lon par bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur ba rnam pa thams cad mi bsten par bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: las dang po dang / smyos pa dang / sems 'khrugs pa dang / tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do // bslab par bya ba ni dge slong gis yul thams cad la gnas skabs thams cad du ma lon par bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur ba rnam pa thams cad mi bsten par bslab par bya'o //
translated: There is no downfall if one is a beginner, or insane, or deranged, or in extreme pain.üîΩThe training rule is that a monk should train in not engaging in any way in the act of giving full ordination to someone who has not completed twenty years.

original: mkhan po des bsnyen par rdzogs par bya ba de la lo nyi shu lon pa nyid mi 'dri bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: mkhan po des bsnyen par rdzogs par bya ba de la lo nyi shu lon pa nyid mi 'dri bar mi bya'o //
translated: The preceptor should not give full ordination to someone without asking whether he has completed twenty years.

original: mkhan po las gzhan pa'i dge slong der gtogs pa gzhan gyis kyang mi 'dri bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: mkhan po las gzhan pa'i dge slong der gtogs pa gzhan gyis kyang mi 'dri bar mi bya'o //
translated: No one else, not even a monk, should ask him except the preceptor.

original: lo nyi shu lon pa nyid du nges par mi shes par de bsnyen par rdzogs par mi bya'o //
analyzed: lo nyi shu lon pa nyid du nges par mi shes par de bsnyen par rdzogs par mi bya'o //
translated: If he is not certain that he is twenty years old, he should not give the full ordination.

original: rnam pa thams cad du lo nyi shu lon pa ni bsnyen par rdzogs pa 'chags so //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du lo nyi shu lon pa ni bsnyen par rdzogs pa 'chags so //
translated: If he is definitely twenty years old, he should give the full ordination.

original: lo nyi shu ma lon pa ni lon par 'du shes pa nyid na @271b 'chags so //üîΩlo grangs mi shes pa dang / lo tshigs mi dran pa dang / lon nam ma lon yid gnyis za ba dag la yang lo nyi shu lon pa nyid du 'du shes pa nyid na 'chags so //
analyzed: lo nyi shu ma lon pa ni lon par 'du shes pa nyid na @271b 'chags so // lo grangs mi shes pa dang / lo tshigs mi dran pa dang / lon nam ma lon yid gnyis za ba dag la yang lo nyi shu lon pa nyid du 'du shes pa nyid na 'chags so //
translated: If he is not twenty years old, but thinks he is, he should give the full ordination.üîΩIf he does not know how old he is, or remembers incorrectly, or is unsure whether he is twenty years old or not, he should give the full ordination if he thinks he is.

original: lo nyi shu ma lon par bsnyen par rdzogs pa lo nyi shu ma lon par 'du shes na sngar sngom pa 'chags pa de 'jig go ;
analyzed: lo nyi shu ma lon par bsnyen par rdzogs pa lo nyi shu ma lon par 'du shes na sngar sngom pa 'chags pa de 'jig go ;
translated: If he gives the full ordination to someone who is not twenty years old, and he thinks he is not, he breaks the rule.

original: / gal te bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i 'og tu bdag nyid lo nyi shu ma lon no snyam pa'i 'du shes skyes pa'i gnas skabs de'i tshe na dge slong des lo nyi shu lon par gyur na ni de'i sngom pa sngar 'chags pa ni mi 'jig go //üîΩlo nyi shu ma lon par bsnyen par rdzogs par de ltar the tshom skyes pas de'i tshon mngal na gnas pa'i zla ba dag dang shol gyi zla bdag gis kyang bsnan te lo nyi shur tshang na sngar sngom pa chags pa de mi 'jig go /
analyzed: / gal te bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i 'og tu bdag nyid lo nyi shu ma lon no snyam pa'i 'du shes skyes pa'i gnas skabs de'i tshe na dge slong des lo nyi shu lon par gyur na ni de'i sngom pa sngar 'chags pa ni mi 'jig go // lo nyi shu ma lon par bsnyen par rdzogs par de ltar the tshom skyes pas de'i tshon mngal na gnas pa'i zla ba dag dang shol gyi zla bdag gis kyang bsnan te lo nyi shur tshang na sngar sngom pa chags pa de mi 'jig go /
translated: If, after full ordination, the thought arises, ‚ÄúI have not reached twenty years of age,‚Äù then if the monk has reached twenty years of age, his former vows are not lost.üîΩIf one is fully ordained before reaching twenty years of age, and if one has doubts about it, then if the number of months spent in the womb and the number of months of the intercalary year are added to the twenty years, and if the total is complete, then the former vows are not lost.

original: bsnyen par rdzogs kar ni de dag gis bsnan te brtsi bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: bsnyen par rdzogs kar ni de dag gis bsnan te brtsi bar mi bya'o //
translated: But if one is fully ordained after reaching twenty years of age, then the number of months spent in the womb and the number of months of the intercalary year are not added to the twenty years.

original: phyir bcos pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: phyir bcos pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The amendment is the same as before.
